verses.text: I will \w extol|strong="H7311"\w* thee, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; for thou hast lifted me \w up|strong="H1802"\w*, and hast not made my \w foes|strong="H0341"\w* to \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* over me.
O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, I \w cried|strong="H7768"\w* unto thee, and thou hast \w healed|strong="H7495"\w* me.

O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, thou hast brought \w up|strong="H5927"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* from the \w grave|strong="H7585"\w*: thou hast kept me \w alive|strong="H2421"\w*, that I should not go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w pit|strong="H0953"\w*.

\w Sing|strong="H2167"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, O ye \w saints|strong="H2623"\w* of his, and give \w thanks|strong="H3034"\w* at the \w remembrance|strong="H2143"\w* of his \w holiness|strong="H6944"\w*.\f + \fr 30.4 \ft at…: or, to the memorial\f*

For his \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* \add endureth but\add* a \w moment|strong="H7281"\w*; in his \w favour|strong="H7522"\w* \add is\add* \w life|strong="H2416"\w*: \w weeping|strong="H1065"\w* may \w endure|strong="H3885"\w* for a \w night|strong="H6153"\w*, but \w joy|strong="H7440"\w* \add cometh\add* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*.\f + \fr 30.5 \ft his anger…: Heb. there is but a moment in his anger\f*\f + \fr 30.5 \ft for a night: Heb. in the evening\f*\f + \fr 30.5 \ft joy: Heb. singing\f*
And in my \w prosperity|strong="H7959"\w* I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I shall \w never|strong="H5769"\w* be \w moved|strong="H4131"\w*.

\nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, by thy \w favour|strong="H7522"\w* thou hast made my \w mountain|strong="H2042"\w* to \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w strong|strong="H5797"\w*: thou didst \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, \add and\add* I was \w troubled|strong="H0926"\w*.\f + \fr 30.7 \ft made…: Heb. settled strength for my mountain\f*

I \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* to thee, O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; and unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* I made \w supplication|strong="H2603"\w*.

What \w profit|strong="H1215"\w* \add is there\add* in my \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, when I go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w pit|strong="H7845"\w*? Shall the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* thee? shall it \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* thy \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*?

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and have \w mercy|strong="H2603"\w* upon me: 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, be thou my \w helper|strong="H5826"\w*.

Thou hast \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* for me my \w mourning|strong="H4553"\w* into \w dancing|strong="H4234"\w*: thou hast put \w off|strong="H6605"\w* my \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w*, and \w girded|strong="H0247"\w* me with \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w*;

To the end that \add my\add* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* may \w sing|strong="H2167"\w* praise to thee, and not be \w silent|strong="H1826"\w*. O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, I will give \w thanks|strong="H3034"\w* unto thee for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.\f + \fr 30.12 \ft my glory: that is, my tongue, or, my soul\f*
